sentences.en: I clearly empathize with the people who live in those neighbourhoods.
sentences.cn: 我非常理解住在那些社区的人。

sentences.en: To Americans, polite conversationalists empathize by displaying expressions of excitement or disgust, shock or sadness.
sentences.cn: 对美国人来说，礼貌的交谈者通过表现出兴奋或厌恶、震惊或悲伤的表情来感同身受。

sentences.en: The first and probably most important way is to empathize.
sentences.cn: 也许第一个最关键的方法就是引起共鸣。
